CustomField.formula: IF(Average_Response_Pendula_del__c >= 8, IMAGE("/resource/GREENFACE", "Positive",30,35), IF(Average_Response_Pendula_del__c >= 6, IMAGE("/resource/ORANGEFACE", "Neutral",30,35), IF(Average_Response_Pendula_del__c >= 3, IMAGE("/resource/REDFACE", "Negative",30,35), IF(Average_Response_Pendula_del__c > 0, IMAGE("/resource/DEVILFACE", "Very Negative",30,35), ""))))
CustomField.label: Average Response
